mapper.sql:
where 1 = 1
and sku.code like CONCAT('%',#{obj.code},'%')
and sku.goodsId like CONCAT('%',#{obj.goodsId},'%')
and (sku.code like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or sku.num like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or sku.price like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') or goods.name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
mapper.select:
select sku.id as id,sku.num as num,sku.price as price,sku.code as code, goods.name as name,t.ids as ids,t.value as value,image.url as url from t_goods_sku as sku left join t_goods as goods on sku.goodsId = goods.id left join t_goods_image as image on sku.id = image.skuid left join (select pro_val.skuId,group_concat(pro_val.value SEPARATOR '|#$%|') as value, group_concat(pro_val.id) as ids from t_goods_pro_val as pro_val group by pro_val.skuId) as t on t.skuid = sku.id
order by id desc
select count(sku.id) from t_goods_sku as sku left join t_goods as goods on sku.goodsId = goods.id
mapper.update: update t_goods_sku set price = #{price},goodsId = #{goodsId},code = #{code} where id = #{id}
update t_goods_sku set num = (#{num}+t_goods_sku.num) where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.*, img.url from (select sku.id as id, sku.num, sku.price, sku.goodsid, val.val as value, pro.name, pro.typeid from (select *, GROUP_CONCAT(value) as val from t_goods_pro_val GROUP BY skuid) as val left join t_goods_pro as pro on val.proid = pro.id left join t_goods_sku as sku on val.skuid = sku.id) as t left join t_goods_image as img on t.id = img.skuid where t.goodsid = #{goodsId} and t.num > 0
